  • Method Details

    • of

      static CurieUtil of(Map<String,String> curieToIri)
      Create CurieUtil backed by provided curieToIri map.
      Parameters:
      curieToIri - map of CURIE prefixes (e.g. HP) to IRI prefixes (e.g. http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/HP_).
      Returns:
      an instance backed by the provided Map.

    • hasPrefix

      boolean hasPrefix(String curiePrefix)

    • getCurie

      Optional<TermId> getCurie(String iri)
      Get CURIE for given iri.
      Parameters:
      iri - international resource identifier (e.g. http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/HP_1234567).
      Returns:
      the corresponding CURIE (e.g. HP:1234567) or an empty optional if the IRI prefix is not recognized.

    • getExpansion

      Optional<String> getExpansion(String curiePrefix)
      Parameters:
      curiePrefix - CURIE prefix, e.g. HP for HP:1234567.
      Returns:
      the corresponding expansion (e.g. http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/HP_).

    • getIri

      default Optional<String> getIri(TermId curie)
      Expand CURIE to IRI.
      Parameters:
      curie - CURIE to expand (e.g. HP:1234567).
      Returns:
      IRI value (e.g. http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/HP_1234567).
